channel.title: PI bugs?
channel.description:
The first thing I need help with is the usernames on my server they are coming out really weird... http://prntscr.com/65wjqm
The second thing the highscores. They don't show users half the time that are online... http://prntscr.com/65wl3m
Lastly, the login auto join cc only works when the clan leader is online and in the cc...
